name: Furude Rika and Houjou Satoko (Higurashi)
description:
LORA trained on 1761 fanart and official images of Furude Rika and Houjou Satoko from Higurashi no Naku Koro ni.

Use furude rika or houjou satoko trigger keyword.

For Rika's head, use long hair, blue hair, purple eyes tags,

For Rika's school uniform, use school uniform, pink bow, collared shirt, pleated skirt, suspenders, flat chest tags.

For Rika's casual outfit, use sundress, green dress, bare shoulders tags.

For Rika's shrine maiden outfit, use japanese clothes, miko tags,

For Satoko's head, use blonde hair, short hair, hairband, red eyes, (+ fang if you want open mouth) tags.

For Satoko's school uniform, use green dress, white sailor collar, yellow neckerchief, short sleeves, puffy sleeves, black pantyhose (+ skirt to negative prompt) tags.

For Satoko's casual outfit, use pink shirt, sleeveless shirt, collared shirt, blue shorts, bare arms tags.

Model works mostly the same on 0.5-1.0 weight, lower it if you feel that it overwrites your style or other details.

Combining both girls in one image mostly doesn't give good results if you don't use inpainting.

Works best on model it was trained on - anything-v4.5-pruned-fp16.

Training and dataset parameters:

  • Images were scraped from gelbooru (NSFW exluded), captions generated with WD tagger;

  • Trained using kohya-ss LORA training GUI, rank 128, resolution 512x768, no regularisation folder, other settings were default;

  • Trained on anything-v4.5-pruned-fp16 model;

  • 3 epochs, 5 steps per image for 60 selected images, 3 steps per image for 37 angel mort uniform images, and 1 step per image for the rest 1664 images.

Images on preview were generated using style LORAs you can find on this site or here https://huggingface.co/closertodeath/ctdlora/tree/main
